title: rAmachandra prabhu
sahitya:
rAmacandra prabhu tum bina pyArE kaun khabar lE mErI


caraNam 1    bAj rahi jinki nagarai mO sadA dharam kI mErI
    caraNam 2    jAkE caraN kamal kI rajsO tiriyA tan kU phErI
    caraNam 3    auran kU kacu aur bharOsA hamE bharOsA tErI
    caraNam 4    padmanAbh prabhu phaNi parashAyi krpA karO kyOn dErI
